title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), the scrollbars appear to be enabled. However, upon attempting to move the scrollbars, it is observed that they do not have any effect. This issue becomes evident when opening a small image such as an icon since the scrollbars are misleading and do not serve any purpose.
EB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled so that they are not shown and do not provide the illusion of being functional.
